January 12, 2016 7:33 am

New Delhi, Jan 12 (ANI): Reacting on the black money statement of Yoga Guru Baba Ramdev, Congress leader Shobha Oza on Tuesday said the Modi government, which had black money as an important issue in their election manifesto, has now gone silent on the matter. She further said that PM Modi has failed on his promise to bring the black money back. Meanwhile, Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) leader Sudesh Verma said that necessary steps were being taken by the government on black money and assured that the results would come soon.

Yoga News and Research
======================

[RSS](https://www.news-medical.net/tag/feed/Yoga.aspx)

Yoga is an ancient system of practices used to balance the mind and body through exercise, meditation (focusing thoughts), and control of breathing and emotions. Yoga is being studied as a way to relieve stress and treat sleep problems in cancer patients.

#### Further Reading

*   [International Day of Yoga 2022: growing a self care practice with the branches of yoga](https://www.news-medical.net/health/International-Day-of-Yoga-2022-growing-a-self-care-practice-with-the-branches-of-yoga.aspx)

[![Image 3: Older women are different than older men. Their health is woefully understudied.](https://d2jx2rerrg6sh3.cloudfront.net/image-handler/picture/2019/5/shutterstock_1095373769_dda8a292d9b74a169966e610c130e1c1-310x240.jpg)](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Older-women-are-different-than-older-men-Their-health-is-woefully-understudied.aspx)

### [Older women are different than older men. Their health is woefully understudied.](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Older-women-are-different-than-older-men-Their-health-is-woefully-understudied.aspx)

Medical research has shortchanged women for decades. This is particularly true of older women, leaving physicians without critically important information about how to best manage their health.

18 Jun 2024

[![Image 4: Physical activity in natural settings offers benefits over other exercise](https://d2jx2rerrg6sh3.cloudfront.net/images/news/ImageForNews_783058_454611923308449046709-150x125.jpg)](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Physical-activity-in-natural-settings-offers-benefits-over-other-exercise.aspx)

The health benefits of physical activity in natural settings (PANS) and strategies to promote it.

18 Jun 2024

[![Image 5: Research highlights positive impact of yoga and mediterranean diet on elderly health](https://d2jx2rerrg6sh3.cloudfront.net/images/news/ImageForNews_781058_454403652816666654299-150x125.jpg)](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Research-highlights-positive-impact-of-yoga-and-mediterranean-diet-on-elderly-health.aspx)

### [Research highlights positive impact of yoga and mediterranean diet on elderly health](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Research-highlights-positive-impact-of-yoga-and-mediterranean-diet-on-elderly-health.aspx)

The combined effects of yoga and the Mediterranean diet (MD) on various health outcomes in community-dwelling older adults.

28 May 2024

[![Image 6: Study reveals common yet overlooked mystical experiences impact well-being](https://d2jx2rerrg6sh3.cloudfront.net/images/news/ImageForNews_780928_45436411590162046854-150x125.jpg)](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240526/Study-reveals-common-yet-overlooked-mystical-experiences-impact-well-being.aspx)

### [Study reveals common yet overlooked mystical experiences impact well-being](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240526/Study-reveals-common-yet-overlooked-mystical-experiences-impact-well-being.aspx)

Researchers found that emergent phenomena (EP) from practices like meditation and mindfulness are common and can lead to both positive and negative outcomes, highlighting the need for better clinical support.

26 May 2024

[![Image 7: Altered states of consciousness common in meditation, study finds](https://d2jx2rerrg6sh3.cloudfront.net/image-handler/picture/2017/6/Closeup_of_woman%27s_hands_meditating_indoors-Luna_Vandoorne_2f70c06d04f041628deee807b0c71b7e-150x125.jpg)](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Altered-states-of-consciousness-common-in-meditation-study-finds.aspx)

### [Altered states of consciousness common in meditation, study finds](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Altered-states-of-consciousness-common-in-meditation-study-finds.aspx)

Yoga, mindfulness, meditation, breathwork, and other practices are gaining in popularity due to their potential to improve health and well-being.

20 May 2024

[![Image 8: Yogic practices enhance heart health and functional capacity in heart failure patients](https://d2jx2rerrg6sh3.cloudfront.net/image-handler/picture/2017/1/Anatomy_of_Human_Heart.-Liya_Graphics_5ac9d64765b747899bc4a9ef77468432-150x125.jpg)](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Yogic-practices-enhance-heart-health-and-functional-capacity-in-heart-failure-patients.aspx)

### [Yogic practices enhance heart health and functional capacity in heart failure patients](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240513/Yogic-practices-enhance-heart-health-and-functional-capacity-in-heart-failure-patients.aspx)

Yoga focused on breathing, meditation, and relaxation is linked with symptom improvement in patients with heart failure, according to research presented today at Heart Failure 2024, a scientific congress of the European Society of Cardiology.

13 May 2024

[![Image 9: Relaxation interventions can be offered to lactating parents who would like to improve milk supply and increase well-being](https://d2jx2rerrg6sh3.cloudfront.net/images/news/ImageForNews_779398_4542132110464128172-150x125.jpg)](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Relaxation-interventions-can-be-offered-to-lactating-parents-who-would-like-to-improve-milk-supply-and-increase-well-being.aspx)

### [Relaxation interventions can be offered to lactating parents who would like to improve milk supply and increase well-being](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Relaxation-interventions-can-be-offered-to-lactating-parents-who-would-like-to-improve-milk-supply-and-increase-well-being.aspx)

A recent study in JAMA Pediatrics explored the utility of relaxation therapy in increasing milk production in human mothers.

9 May 2024

[![Image 10: Study shows yoga's positive impact on emotional health in forensic psychiatry](https://d2jx2rerrg6sh3.cloudfront.net/image-handler/picture/2017/1/%40Man_wearing_white_cloth_sits_on_yoga_map_with_yoga_and_meditation_poses_in_the_park_-_Chanyanuch_Wannasinlapin_4996856c75ea43da9a6290f8be74c377-150x125.jpg)](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240422/Study-shows-yogas-positive-impact-on-emotional-health-in-forensic-psychiatry.aspx)

### [Study shows yoga's positive impact on emotional health in forensic psychiatry](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240422/Study-shows-yogas-positive-impact-on-emotional-health-in-forensic-psychiatry.aspx)

Previous studies in correctional facilities have shown positive effects of yoga on inmates. They experience increased impulse control and improved mental health.

22 Apr 2024

[![Image 11: Genetic predisposition to stress linked with higher heart attack risk](https://d2jx2rerrg6sh3.cloudfront.net/image-handler/picture/2014/7/Heart_Attack-150x125.jpg)](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/Genetic-predisposition-to-stress-linked-with-higher-heart-attack-risk.aspx)

### [Genetic predisposition to stress linked with higher heart attack risk](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/Genetic-predisposition-to-stress-linked-with-higher-heart-attack-risk.aspx)

People with specific genetic traits and those who have anxiety or depression have a significantly higher heart attack risk during periods of social or political stress than at other times, according to a new study being presented at the American College of Cardiology's Annual Scientific Session.

27 Mar 2024

The association between physical exercise and depression risk among married individuals.

20 Mar 2024

[![Image 13: Statistical models vs. front-line workers: Who knows best how to spend opioid settlement cash?](https://d2jx2rerrg6sh3.cloudfront.net/image-handler/picture/2019/5/futuristic_techno_design_on_background_of_supercomputer_data_center_-_Image_-_Timofeev_Vladimir_M1_d3fe6d1e341e4949b64573b0f35e40ed-150x125.jpg)](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Statistical-models-vs-front-line-workers-Who-knows-best-how-to-spend-opioid-settlement-cash.aspx)

5 Mar 2024

### [Yoga may benefit individuals with back pain](https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Yoga-may-benefit-individuals-with-back-pain.aspx)

New research published in the Journal of Orthopaedic Research suggests that the physical postures, breathing exercises, and mindfulness practices of yoga may benefit individuals with back pain.
